channel.title: Specialist Correspondent on AAN World News
channel.description: Recent content in Specialist Correspondent on AAN World News

item.title: Vibor Square incident
item.description: Militia promptly opened fire to protesters against Chedaki occupiers. (AAN World News) PEACEFUL GATHERING TURNS INTO HEATED PROTEST It was a peaceful day when citizens of Vibor gathered at the town’s square to commemorate victims of the last war. Prayer and memorial service were planned to be conducted by a local priest. The gathered quickly started to become agitated by the priest’s words, regarding not only the past wars, but also current situation in Chernarus and its Chedaki occupation.

item.title: Zelenogorsk Base Commander in trouble
item.description: Rumours said base commander was demoted to private. Turns out he indeed cleans trash in some remote chedaki camp. (AAN World News) Pointless loss of life Thanks to anonymous sources, we are finally able to follow up on the recent scandalous night at Zelenogorsk military base, where a soldier - Janusz Bambaryla - was shot on base commander’s orders and bled to death. The poor soul had had enough of harsh treatment during help with unloading cargo from train and decided to make a run for it in a reposessed armoured vehicle, which would aid his unit.
